title: Circle of Nations
description: Which countries would more likely to join the same organizations? This was my final internship project for Interactive Things, a Switzerland based Data Visualization and UX Design studio.

title: How many times has your constituency changed?
description: Analysis of constituency changes in Singapore since 1968.

title: 10 Years of "Exclusive" Economic Growth
description: Did the regional provinces experience the same economic growth as what the whole country experiences?

title: Visualizing Philippine Tourism
description: Visualizing the Trends on Tourists and Travel Destinations in the Philippines by Local and Foreign Tourists.

title: How Represented Are You In The Data Visualization Community?
description: Is your background rare in the community of data visualization professionals and enthusiasts?

title: Out of Reach
description: Visualizing income inequalities between countries and between income groups within countries. Created during my internship at Interactive Things.

title: Cebu City Jeepney Transport Map
description: Designing a unique public transport map with a unique mode of transport.

title: Eurovision Country Voting
description: Which countries voted which countries in Eurovision? A personal project. (external link)
